lines: Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu, Ngi nikela ngesihle
Ngi zothemba njalo kuYe, Ngi phile naYe lapha
Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu, Ngi guq’ ezinyaweni
Ngi del’ inzuzo yomhlaba, Ng’thatha Jesu ngi thathe
Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu, Ng’enze ngcwele, Msindisi
Ngi phe owAkho uMoya, U be ngowam’impela
Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu, Ngi zwa umlil’ oNgcwele
